Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<<AzureBlade was overjoyed to hear her words. He wanted to yell his 
happiness, but he refrained and simply smiled. He smiled widely, but 
he only smiled.

AzureBlade: I respect your choice and I appreciate it. It is ironic 
though! I had just told them I wanted to be left alone for some times, 
and I am about to come back with a new rookie! Do you think you'll be 
able to fly though? It is a long way...>>

"I think I'll be able to manage." Mistra said, still smiling slightly. Her 
only prominent problem right now was her activation code...although she 
should be able to manage it somehow. It shouldn't be too hard...

<<Kali::

Kali arrived where Azure blade and Mistra were "So, you arrived 
first"said the femme while she trasformed to her pretty robot mode "I 
guess that you're a maximal, aren't you???">>

Mistra's eyes widened at the new arrival...and dragon bot? Only a female 
bot.. Her ears flew back, only hoping this bot would be as kind as Azure had 
been up till now. Even if it seemed doubtful...there was a war going on right 
now. If this bot attacked, what would Mistra be able to do? She'd have to go 
offline for a brief period to change her activation code from whatever it 
was...she knew that much. Hopefully there wouldn't be a battle...not now.

<<AzureBlade turned quickly to face...
Another dragon bot. The ones he knew were either maximal or Predacon, 
and since the maximal ones were unheard of since the last battle...

AzureBlade: What of it? What if I really am?

He stood on his guards, but did not appear threatening... for now...>>

Relieved by the reminder that Azure was in fact still there, Mistra felt a 
bit better about it...although she wouldn't sit to a side if a battle did 
occur. She moved slowly, always facing Kali, until she was beside Azure. She 
felt safer there anyway...and her status pod didn't matter now.


--part1_a0.21cd7443.29931c52_boundary
